messages.subject: Hello to everyone
messages.msgSnippet: All, Hi, my name is Totok Sudarijanto from Indonesia. I am new at this mailing list. I am glad that I found this mailing list. Thanks. Regards, Practice is
messages.messageBody:
All,

Hi, my name is Totok Sudarijanto from Indonesia. I am new at this mailing
list. I am glad that I found this mailing list.

Thanks.
Regards,



"Practice is the only way that you will ever
come to understand what Bushido is about."




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
